contentfulProduct.seoTitle: Organic Cotton Stretch Oxford Shirt | Quince
contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Available for a radically low price, the men's oxford shirt is made with 100% organic cotton using a unique weaving process that offers the perfect amount of natural stretch without the need for spandex.
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Cotton Stretch Oxford Shirt
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $58

content.value: Buy 1, get any 2nd shirt for 50% off
Buy 2, get any 3rd shirt for free
Also, add an Organic No-Show Sock 3-pack for only $8.90 $12.90

Fusing design and functionality, this oxford shirt features a substantial 165g fabric weight as a nod to the durable oxfords of the 90s. The men's oxford shirt is made with 100% organic cotton using a unique weaving process that offers the perfect amount of natural stretch without the need for spandex.
100% organic cotton with mechanical stretch
Genuine mother of pearl buttons
Garment washed for a soft hand feel
Slim fit
Model is 6'2" and wearing both the blue and white oxford shirt in a size Medium
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• 100% organic cotton with mechanical stretch
  • Genuine mother of pearl buttons
  • Garment washed for a soft hand feel
  • Slim fit
  • Model is 6'2" and wearing both the blue and white oxford shirt in a size Medium

productDescription.productDescription: Fusing design and functionality, this oxford shirt features a substantial 165g fabric weight as a nod to the durable oxfords of the 90s. The men's oxford shirt is made with 100% organic cotton using a unique weaving process that offers the perfect amount of natural stretch without the need for spandex.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
